alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 10:17PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Clay, eastern Nuckolls, southwestern Fillmore and Thayer Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1017 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sutton to near Davenport to near Ruskin to Superior. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ruskin around 1020 PM CDT. Hardy and Ong around 1025 PM CDT. Deshler, Shickley and Byron around 1030 PM CDT. Hebron and Chester around 1035 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Carleton, Strang, Bruning, Hubbell and Belvidere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
